message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm afraid $90 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $110. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $110. Would you be willing to consider $95?
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll meet you at $105. That's the lowest I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to get the best deal possible. Would you be willing to meet me at $98?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $102. That's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to get the best deal possible. Would you be willing to meet me at $99?

I'm getting a bit frustrated that we're not meeting in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but it's my last one. I'll meet you at $101. That's as low as I can go. What do you think?
